<title level="1" right="Hazard 2" pfs="">[Explosive Barrels](/Hazards.aspx?ID=366)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Environmental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=62" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace](/Sources.aspx?ID=45) pg. 10</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

Wooden barrels marked with an oil-drop symbol catch fire and explode.

---

**Stealth**
DC 15

**Disable**
[Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) DC 20 to smother the flames without rupturing the barrels

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 15, **Fort** +11, **Ref** +3

**Hardness**
1

**HP**
5

**Immunities**
object immunities, precision damage

</column>

**Explode** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** 4 rounds pass after the agents' arrival without anyone smothering them; **Effect** The barrels explode, dealing 3d6+8 fire damage to everything within a 20-foot radius ([basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) DC 20 Reflex save).
name: Explosive Barrels
